item.title: Why Create a Blog?
item.description: The best way to get started on the path to sharing your work is to think about what you want to learn, and make a commitment to learning it in front of others. Donâ€™t think of your website as a self-promotion machine, think of it as a self-invention machine. Show Your Work! by Austin Kleon Time to stop procrastinating, self-doubting and agonising of wanting to write a post and becoming afraid and avoidant.
